summary: Man leaves his fortune to his dog and its psychiatrist.
cast: Kirk Cameron|Chelsea Noble|John de Lancie|Christine Healy|Granville Van Dusen|Christine Cavanaugh|Hansford Rowe|Jane Carr|Taylor Negron|James Avery|Tom McCleister|Myra Turley|Patricia Belcher|Jillian Berard|Kristopher Logan|David Higlen|Mary Pat Gleason|Rick Fitts|Susie Coelho|Mitchell Edmonds|John Webber|Bogus|Phillip Glasser|Julia Anna Barrios
title: Un perro con suerte
